other_tests.findings: Showed acute mucosal inflammation but no involvement of the serosa or muscularis.
The isolate from the child and four cattle isolates had similar restriction-fragment patterns.

other_tests.procedure_name: Bacterial strains and antibiotic susceptibility testing
other_tests.findings: Isolate from child was resistant to multiple antibiotics, including ceftriaxone.
Transconjugants exhibited decreased susceptibility to all antimicrobial agents, including ceftriaxone.
The isolate from the child produced an AmpC-like beta-lactamase.
